title: Populate Active Directory with Sample Data
description: Checks for Active Directory Domain Services and populates the domain with realistic sample users, groups, and organizational units for testing purposes.

userCount.description: Number of sample users to create (between 10-100)

departmentCount.description: Number of department OUs to create (between 3-8)

createServiceAccounts.description: Create sample service accounts for testing

enablePasswordPolicy.description: Apply a realistic fine-grained password policy

createSecurityGroups.description: Create department-based security groups and assign users

runCommand.commandToExecute: [concat('powershell.exe -ExecutionPolicy Unrestricted -File ./PopulateADSampleData.ps1', ' -UserCount ', parameters('userCount'), ' -DepartmentCount ', parameters('departmentCount'), ' -CreateServiceAccounts:', parameters('createServiceAccounts'), ' -EnablePasswordPolicy:', parameters('enablePasswordPolicy'), ' -CreateSecurityGroups:', parameters('createSecurityGroups'))]
